verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came כִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> heard כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> And it came to pass when all the kings הָאֱמֹרִ֡י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> who בְּעֵ֨בֶר <WH5676> which [were] on the side הַיַּרְדֵּ֜ן <WH3383> of Jordan יָ֗מָּה <WH3220> westward וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מַלְכֵ֤י <WH4428> and all the kings הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> of the Canaanites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> by הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> which [were] by the sea אֵ֠ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הוֹבִ֨ישׁ <WH3001> had dried up יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֵ֧י <WH4325> the waters הַיַּרְדֵּ֛ן <WH3383> of Jordan מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from before בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עַד־ <WH5704> until [עָבְרָנוּ כ] (עָבְרָ֑ם <WH5674> alienate ק) וַיִּמַּ֣ס <WH4549> melted לְבָבָ֗ם <WH3824> that their heart וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֨יָה <WH1961> came בָ֥ם עוֹד֙ <WH5750> any ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> neither was there spirit מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> in them any more because בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> he אָמַ֤ר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua עֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> Make לְךָ֖ חַֽרְב֣וֹת <WH2719> knives צֻרִ֑ים <WH6697> thee sharp וְשׁ֛וּב <WH7725> again מֹ֥ל <WH4135> and circumcise אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel שֵׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> the second time

וַיַּעַשׂ־ <WH6213> made ל֥וֹ יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> And Joshua חַֽרְב֣וֹת <WH2719> knives צֻרִ֑ים <WH6697> him sharp וַיָּ֙מָל֙ <WH4135> and circumcised אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> at גִּבְעַ֖ת <WH1389> at the hill הָעֲרָלֽוֹת׃ <WH6190> of the foreskins

וְזֶ֥ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> And this [is] the cause אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> why מָ֣ל <WH4135> did circumcise יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> why Joshua כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> All the people הַיֹּצֵא֩ <WH3318> that came out מִמִּצְרַ֨יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הַזְּכָרִ֜ים <WH2145> [that were] males כֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> [even] all the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> of war מֵ֤תוּ <WH4191> died בַמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> in the wilderness בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <WH3318> after they came out מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Now מֻלִ֣ים <WH4135> were circumcised הָי֔וּ <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> for all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> all the people הַיֹּֽצְאִ֑ים <WH3318> that came out וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָ֠עָם <WH5971> but all the people הַיִּלֹּדִ֨ים <WH3209> [that were] born בַּמִּדְבָּ֥ר <WH4057> in the wilderness בַּדֶּ֛רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way בְּצֵאתָ֥ם <WH3318> as they came forth מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt לֹא־ <WH3808> had not מָֽלוּ׃ <WH4135> [them] they had not circumcised

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> years הָלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> walked בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> For the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel בַּמִּדְבָּר֒ <WH4057> in the wilderness עַד־ <WH5704> until תֹּ֨ם <WH8552> were consumed כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּ֜וֹי <WH1471> till all the people אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> the men הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> of war הַיֹּצְאִ֣ים <WH3318> which came out מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> because they obeyed בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> not the voice יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to whom נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto whom the LORD לָהֶ֔ם לְבִלְתִּ֞י <WH1115> because הַרְאוֹתָ֣ם <WH7200> that he would not shew אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> them the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַֽאֲבוֹתָם֙ <WH1> unto their fathers לָ֣תֶת <WH5414> that he would give לָ֔נוּ אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> us a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> and honey

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> And their children הֵקִ֣ים <WH6965> [whom] he raised up תַּחְתָּ֔ם <WH8478> their place אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מָ֣ל <WH4135> circumcised יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> in their stead them Joshua כִּי־ <WH3588> because עֲרֵלִ֣ים <WH6189> for they were uncircumcised הָי֔וּ <WH1961> become כִּ֛י <WH3588> because לֹא־ <WH3808> had not מָ֥לוּ <WH4135> because they had not circumcised אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> them by the way

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they תַּ֥מּוּ <WH8552> And it came to pass when they had done כָל־ <WH3605> all הַגּ֖וֹי <WH1471> all the people לְהִמּ֑וֹל <WH4135> circumcising וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> that they abode תַחְתָּ֛ם <WH8478> their places בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> in their places in the camp עַ֥ד <WH5704> until חֲיוֹתָֽם׃ <WH2421> till they were whole פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> This day גַּלּ֛וֹתִי <WH1556> have I rolled away אֶת־ <WH853> חֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> the reproach מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> and וַיִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> is called שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> from off you Wherefore the name הַמָּק֤וֹם <WH4725> of the place הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he גִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> Gilgal עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וַיַּחֲנ֥וּ <WH2583> encamped בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּגִּלְגָּ֑ל <WH1537> in Gilgal וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> and kept אֶת־ <WH853> הַפֶּ֡סַח <WH6453> the passover בְּאַרְבָּעָה֩ <WH702> four עָשָׂ֨ר <WH6240> teen י֥וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֛דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month בָּעֶ֖רֶב <WH6153> at even בְּעַֽרְב֥וֹת <WH6160> in the plains יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> of Jericho

וַיֹּ֨אכְל֜וּ <WH398> And they did eat מֵעֲב֥וּר <WH5669> of the old corn הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִמָּֽחֳרַ֥ת <WH4283> on the morrow הַפֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> after the passover מַצּ֣וֹת <WH4682> unleavened cakes וְקָל֑וּי <WH7033> and parched בְּעֶ֖צֶם <WH6106> [corn] in the selfsame הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> he

וַיִּשְׁבֹּ֨ת <WH7673> ceased הַמָּ֜ן <WH4478> And the manna מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <WH4283> on the morrow בְּאָכְלָם֙ <WH398> after they had eaten מֵעֲב֣וּר <WH5669> of the old corn הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יָה <WH1961> had ע֛וֹד <WH5750> longer לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> neither had the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מָ֑ן <WH4478> manna וַיֹּאכְל֗וּ <WH398> any more but they did eat מִתְּבוּאַת֙ <WH8393> of the fruit אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> that year הַהִֽיא׃ <WH1931> he ס

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בִּֽהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> came יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <WH3091> And it came to pass when Joshua בִּירִיחוֹ֒ <WH3405> was by Jericho וַיִּשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> that he lifted up עֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּ֔רְא <WH7200> and looked וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold אִישׁ֙ <WH376> a man עֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> and behold there stood לְנֶגְדּ֔וֹ <WH5048> opposite וְחַרְבּ֥וֹ <WH2719> over against him with his sword שְׁלוּפָ֖ה <WH8025> drawn בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> and Joshua אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> unto him and said ל֔וֹ הֲלָ֥נוּ אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> us אִם־ <WH518> or לְצָרֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6862> adversary

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> And he said לֹ֗א <WH3808> No כִּ֛י <WH3588> rather אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I שַׂר־ <WH8269> Nay but [as] captain צְבָֽא־ <WH6635> of the host יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now בָ֑אתִי <WH935> am I now come וַיִּפֹּל֩ <WH5307> fell יְהוֹשֻׁ֨עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> on פָּנָ֥יו <WH6440> on his face אַ֙רְצָה֙ <WH776> to the earth וַיִּשְׁתָּ֔חוּ <WH7812> and did worship וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֔וֹ מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH136> has my lord מְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> unto him What saith אֶל־ <WH413> about עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5650> bondage

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said שַׂר־ <WH8269> And the captain צְבָ֨א <WH6635> host יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua שַׁל־ <WH5394> Loose נַֽעַלְךָ֙ <WH5275> thy shoe מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from רַגְלֶ֔ךָ <WH7272> from off thy foot כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> for the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you עֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> whereon thou standest עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> [is] holy ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> did יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> And Joshua כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> so
